DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine total concentration HCMV- VZV-specific IgG-antibodies total concentration neutralize antibody HCMV neonatal bloodstream depend gestational age birth .
DOC.brief_title: Diaplacental Transfer Anti-HCMV- Anti-VZV-immunoglobulin G ( IgG ) -Antibodies Premature Mature Newborns
DOC.detailed_description: For data gathering investigator measure main concentration specific HCMV-/VZV-IgG-antibodies concentration neutralize IgG-antibodies HCMV VZV maternal blood fetal bloodstream . Then investigator compare data mother newborn . Therefore , investigator use follow blood sample : Mother : Venous blood sample take birth ( +/- three day ) Newborn : Blood sample umbilical cord ( = fetal bloodstream ) take immediately birth . The investigator assign data newborn ( gestational age birth ) data respective mother statistical evaluation . After finish study investigator destroy residual blood .
DOC.criteria: HCMV and/or VZVseropositive pregnant woman sign write informed consent form . Newborns underage mother . Newborns whose mother sign write informed consent . Pregnant woman know hereditary acquire immune deficiency
